name: Survival Die
description:
Survival Die

You have to survive until you get a 6, but this could take shorter or longer depending on your luck.

Survival Die is my first game and was also done for he GMTK Game Jam 2022. Hope you enjoy it.

Controls

Arrows to move

Tip

·Remember that every five seconds you roll the dice, meaning the mechanics could change. Try to learn which change each number produces.

PD: Please, feel free to give feedback as it is my first game ever
